DOC.brief_title: Tourniquet vs. Tourniquet During Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: 1 . All unilateral primary knee arthroplasty perform investigator participate study eligible inclusion 2 . Diagnosis osteoarthritis 1 . Revision surgery 2 . Bilateral knee surgery 3 . Age < 18 > 80 4 . BMI > 40 5 . Baseline low extremity strength le 5/5 6 . Vascular calcification 7 . History chronic narcotic use , define 5mg oxycodone q4 hour 8 . Functionally limit spine disease 9 . Other functionally limit low extremity disorder ( i.e . symptomatic ipsilateral hip disease ) 10 . Patients perform baseline functional test 11 . Allergy/contraindication protocol medication 12 . Posttraumatic arthritis 13 . Inflammatory arthritis 14 . Pregnancy 15 . Prisoners 16 . Patients receive care part worker 's compensable injury
